data.title: Cellular Automata Project
data.authors: Rushy Panchal, Krish Pamani, George Georges, Naomi Popkin, Allan Lee

options.width: This is the width (in rows) of the Cellular Automata grid.
options.height: This is the height (in columns) of the Cellular Automata grid. Set it to 1 for 1-Dimensional Automata.
options.interest: This cell, the cell of interest, is turned on if a rule matches a pattern.
options.rules: The Cellular Automata rules dictate which cells to turn on. If any pattern is matched for a specified Cell of Interest, then that cell is turned on.
